item.description:
Bob Grundy our instructor!!! he is very dedicated to this group and has been an inspiration to many new comers who want to come back, its a fun night out.

Just three (3) more lessons for this session. Each week has been so much fun as we learn the steps in Line Dance. Our next "session" will be starting on September 24, 2012. If you missed this session and would like to learn to line dance mark this date as we begin our 10-12 week program. Make sure you have your two left feet and a BIG smile. So far this session we have 14 dances we have learned along with the names of each step.

http://www.billybobs-line-couples-dancing.com/

www.TheCladdaghPub.com

 

 

Dress in comfortable light clothes and wear shoes that don't stick to floor ( but not slippery either).

Bring bottled water, to stay hydrated in between sets, because you will work up a sweat.

You are in for alot of fun while learning dance steps that are very popular.

The room has lots of fans.

Time -7-9pm

Cost- 8.00$ per class
item.how_to_find_us: We are on the second floor this repeats weekly

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Lets Add to the Dances We know. Working on Samba's and Last Weeks Coaster Steps.
